channel.title: CVE Feed for Adrian Tobey -- FormLift for Infusionsoft Web Forms
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adrian Tobey -- FormLift for Infusionsoft Web Forms

item.title: CVE-2024-38773|2024-08-02T04:19:20.408Z -- adrian%20tobey -- formlift%20for%20infusionsoft%20web%20forms
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Adrian Tobey FormLift for Infusionsoft Web Forms allows Blind SQL Injection.This issue affects FormLift for Infusionsoft Web Forms: from n/a through 7.5.17.

item.title: CVE-2024-38773|2024-07-22T10:07:53.644Z -- adrian%20tobey -- formlift%20for%20infusionsoft%20web%20forms
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Adrian Tobey FormLift for Infusionsoft Web Forms allows Blind SQL Injection.This issue affects FormLift for Infusionsoft Web Forms: from n/a through 7.5.17.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Adrian Tobey FormLift for Infusionsoft Web Forms allows Blind SQL Injection.This issue affects FormLift for Infusionsoft Web Forms: from n/a through 7.5.17.
